recipe: Grilled Chicken with Rice and Vegetables: Marinate chicken in herbs, grill, serve with steamed rice and mixed vegetables.
Beef Stew: Brown beef, add potatoes and carrots, simmer in broth until tender.
Pasta Primavera: Cook pasta, mix with sautéed tomatoes and cheese.
Lemon Herb Fish: Bake fish with lemon slices and fresh herbs.
Eggs on Toast: Fry eggs, serve on buttered toast.
Eggs with Onions and Tomatoes: Sauté onions and tomatoes, add scrambled eggs, season with salt and pepper.
Garlic Chicken with Onions: Cook chicken with garlic and onions in a pan.
Beef and Potato Stew with Onions: Simmer beef, onions, and potatoes in broth.
Cheesy Pasta with Onions: Boil pasta, sauté onions, mix with cheese.
Lemon Fish with Onions: Bake fish with onions and lemon.
Chicken Biryani: Cook rice with marinated chicken, spices, and onions in layers.
Aloo Bhujia: Fry potatoes and onions with spices until crispy.
Dal Tadka: Cook lentils with tomatoes and spices, top with ghee tadka.
Aloo Paratha: Stuff paratha dough with spiced potatoes, cook on griddle.
Vegetable Pulao: Cook rice with mixed vegetables and spices.
Chicken Tikka: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, grill.
Paneer Butter Masala: Cook paneer in tomato cream sauce with spices.
Khichdi: Cook rice and lentils with spices, serve with ghee.
Gajar Halwa: Grate carrots, cook with sugar and ghee, garnish with nuts.
Samosa: Fill pastry with spiced potatoes and peas, deep fry.
Fish Curry: Cook fish in coconut milk with spices.
Palak Paratha: Mix spinach in dough, cook with spices.
Mutton Rogan Josh: Cook mutton with onions, spices, and yogurt.
Rice Kheer: Cook rice in milk with sugar and cardamom.
Chana Masala: Cook chickpeas with tomatoes, onions, and spices.
Chocolate Cake: Mix flour, sugar, butter, bake with cocoa.
French Toast: Dip bread in egg mixture, fry.
Pasta Alfredo: Cook pasta, mix with sauce and cheese.
Chicken Nuggets: Bread chicken pieces, fry.
Beef Stir Fry: Stir fry beef with noodles and vegetables.
Baked Salmon: Bake salmon with lemon, butter, and herbs.
Quinoa Salad: Mix quinoa with vegetables and feta.
Lamb Pilaf: Cook lamb with rice, nuts, and spices.
Garlic Shrimp: Sauté shrimp in garlic butter.
Turkey Sandwich: Make sandwich with turkey and cranberries.
Pork Chops with Apples: Cook pork with apples and spices.
Orange Duck: Roast duck with orange sauce.
Veal Marsala: Cook veal with mushrooms in wine sauce.
Rabbit Stew: Simmer rabbit with garlic and herbs.
Venison Marinade: Marinate venison in berry sauce.
Goose with Apples: Roast goose with apple cider.
Pheasant Casserole: Cook pheasant with bacon and onions.
Quail with Grapes: Bake quail with grapes and herbs.
Ostrich Stir Fry: Stir fry ostrich with vegetables.
Emu in Cream Sauce: Cook emu with mushrooms in cream.
Kangaroo Burgers: Grill kangaroo patties with onions.
Buffalo Chili: Cook buffalo with corn and beans.
